.. _`design_system_components_detailpage`:

DetailPage
==========

.. figure:: images/component_detailpage.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Configurable page-level component that displays an :ref:`design_system_components_objectheader`
atop a tabbed layout. While the object header provides object (meta) data, tabs contain related
objects or special views.

Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_objectheader`
